page.title: 18HOBBIES HARDWICK AREA
page.content: {Arts & Crafts}Many people knit,sew, do embroidery,dress making & all kinds of handicrafts,painting or printing, others strip & restore furniture,do home decorating & all kinds of D.I.Y. activities. {Clubs.}There are few clubs actually in the area but people belong to clubs & groups in nearby towns & villages. There is a very active branch of the W.I. covering Hardwick & Shelton & 2 adjoining villages which celebrates its Diamond Jubilee this year.5 ladies belong to other nearby W.I.'s; Royal British Legion & Womens Section Branches have active members.A young man belongs to a chess club.Children belong to Guides,Girls&Boys Brigades. {Entertainments}People enjoy music,sing in various choirs,1 conducts choirs, others play musical instruments or teach music.Youngsters enjoy discos.
